title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Web 2.0 Technology-Enhanced Science Teacher Training Program: Blended

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can design collaborative science lesson plans using Web 2.0 technologies (Google Workspace, blogging tools, etc.)
Participants develop science lesson scenarios applying a constructivist learning model in a VR-based simulation environment

Participants can conduct formative assessments (surveys and practical observations) with three peer teachers over two weeks, derive two digital literacy strategies, apply them to actual classrooms, and submit an effectiveness evaluation report (meeting at least three out of five checklist items).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
